scripts.webpack_96x160: TFLITE=96x160 npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp dist/googlemeet-segmentation-worker.d.ts dist/googlemeet-segmentation-worker96x160.d.ts
scripts.webpack_128x128: TFLITE=128x128 npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp dist/googlemeet-segmentation-worker.d.ts dist/googlemeet-segmentation-worker128x128.d.ts
scripts.webpack_144x256: TFLITE=144x256 npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp dist/googlemeet-segmentation-worker.d.ts dist/googlemeet-segmentation-worker144x256.d.ts
scripts.webpack_256x256: TFLITE=256x256 npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp dist/googlemeet-segmentation-worker.d.ts dist/googlemeet-segmentation-worker256x256.d.ts
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean webpack webpack_96x160 webpack_128x128 webpack_144x256 webpack_256x256
